alert.note: Alert for Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 12:53PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cochise and southeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 145 PM MST... At 1253 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Parker Canyon Lake, or 19 miles east of Nogales, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nogales, Patagonia, Nogales International Airport, Parker Canyon Lake, Patagonia Lake State Park, Fort Huachuca, Kino Springs and Lochiel. This includes the following highways... Route 82 between mile markers 1 and 21. Route 83 between mile markers 6 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
